contentLetters.title: Farewell to Alcohol
contentLetters.content: Today, I say goodbye to the bottle that has taken so much from me. I choose to live a healthier life...

contentLetters.title: Breaking Free from Procrastination
contentLetters.content: No more delays. I am taking charge of my life and pursuing my goals without hesitation. Today marks a new beginning...

prompts.prompt: What negative thoughts do you frequently experience?
prompts.response: I often feel like I'm not good enough...

prompts.prompt: How do these thoughts affect your life?
prompts.response: They make me doubt myself and avoid taking risks...

prompts.prompt: What fears are holding you back?
prompts.response: I'm afraid of failing, of not meeting expectations...

prompts.prompt: What can you do to overcome these fears?
prompts.response: I can start by taking small steps and embracing challenges...
